title: Drawing, "Floating Icebergs, July 2, 1859", 1859
medium: Graphite, white gouache on light brown paper
inscribed: Top left: "Land""Iceberg--enormous size / 3 1/2 miles distant / sstrange ressemblance to a house." Dated, top right
description: Top left: coastline; Top Right: view of an iceberg in the foreground and another in the right background

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Floating Icebergs, July 2, 1859", 1859.
1859. Graphite, white gouache on light brown paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-273-a.
